<http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/blogspot/hsDu/~3/nxqdUTcZmEw/telltale-games-share-their-tips-for.html|Telltale Games share their tips for success on Android TV>
Lily Sheringham, Developer Marketing at Google Play

Editor’s note: This is another post in our series featuring tips from developers finding success on Google Play. This week, we’re sharing advice from Telltale Games on how to create a successful game on Android TV. -Ed.

With new Android hardware being released from the likes of Sony, Sharp, and Philips amongst others, Android TV and Google Play can help you bring your game to users right in their living rooms through a big screen...
